attributes.additional_details:
Ring fence Defence Spending at least 2.1 % of GDP, for the next 5 years rom March 2015 to February 2019.

It is essential that it is maintained at this level, for the National Security of our Nation and the future of our children and their children.

Thousands of Men and Women have given their lives in the security of our country over the past 100 years and we must be able to defend ourselves in the future.
